attributes.action: Make COVID vaccination available 24 hours a day
attributes.additional_details: This would speed up the delivery of the vaccine, making it available to a wider range of priority groups and the general population sooner. The Government claim there is no general clamour for extending the hours the vaccine is available. This petition would test that assertion.
attributes.background: I would like COVID vaccinations to be available round the clock. At the moment they are only offered for limited hours.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
